page.title: 11Middle Brunton Farm
page.content: Middle Brunton Farm was one of the other farms we surveyed. The farm has no{livestock}at all and the only crop which is grown is wheat. We found that farmland and saw that the land was fenced with barbed wire, strips of woodand hedgerow. Typical farm machinery is used on the farm, for instance a combine harvester. As we covered the land we did not find any derelict land. No trees have been planted or felled on any of the land at Middle Brunton Farm. All of the land at Middle Brunton Farm is{cultivated}and there is a small amount of game, such as pheasants and rabbits etc. Middle Brunton Farm has a very modern farmhouse and surroundings.
